description:
Father of Mashiroi Utsuzou. Leader of Mashiroi Kumi (魔死呂威組), a gangster or yakuza organization.
A very proud man, he hired the http://anidb.net/ch10409 [Yorozuya] to retrieve his son from the store room instead of admitting his approach with his son may have been wrong. Despite this he cares for his son greatly and commands the respect of many of his followers despite his age and illness.
name: Mashiroi Kaguzou
